## TestFixtures.vmMouse property

Reference to the VMMouse object that allows to control the mouse at the virtual machine level. It is automatically calibrated to the current page, which means it is possible to pass coordinates relative to the viewport of the current page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
vmMouse: VMMouse;
```
